titleStmt.title: The matchless rogue, or, A brief account of the life of Don Thomazo, the unfortunate son together with the just commendations of the gentlemans ingenious answer to Malice defeated, intituled, Some reflections on Madam Cellier's case : with due respect to the honourable title of captain, which himself says he is worthy of.
titleStmt.author: Cellier, Elizabeth, fl. 1680.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Elizabeth Cellier. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: item at reel 1487:31 lacks all except p. [1], 5-6.
Reproduction of originals in Chetham's Library and Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
